content.rendered:
Directed by Prasanth Pandiyaraj.

Written by Prasanth Pandiyaraj.

Cast Iniya (Revathi). Bala Saravanan (Karuppu). Munishkanth (SI Uthaman). S.S. Chakravarthy (DSP Vaidhyanathan). Kichcha Ravi (Kichcha). Reshma Pasupuleti (Selvi). S R Pandiyan (Murugan). Rnr Mahonar (Inspector Kodilingam)
Language Tamil.

Production Escape Artists Motion Pictures.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 7

Status Finished (4)
